languages.text: "Эти штуки нужно наполнить техножрецами с высокой пси-чувствительностью? Хорошо, но зачем использовать для этого наших слуг? Поищите на удаленных станциях и постах тех, кто сослан в глушь за негодность, и найдете в три раза больше подходящих кандидатов, чем в мануфакторумах нашего мира. Пси-восприимчивость редко сопутствует высокой рациональности, и такие техножрецы часто заканчивают карьеру в глуши".

"You say these cells need to be filled with high psy-sensitivity Tech-Priests? Sure, but why use our own servants? Just check out a few remote stations and outposts, look for cogs who were banished as unfit — and you will find three times as many more suitable candidates than in the manufactorums. Psy-receptivity rarely goes hand in hand with high rationality, and such Tech-Priests often end their careers in some backwater."
languages.original_text: "Эти штуки нужно наполнить техножрецами с высокой пси-чувствительностью? Хорошо, но зачем использовать для этого наших слуг? Поищите на удаленных станциях и постах тех, кто сослан в глушь за негодность, и найдете в три раза больше подходящих кандидатов, чем в мануфакторумах нашего мира. Пси-восприимчивость редко сопутствует высокой рациональности, и такие техножрецы часто заканчивают карьеру в глуши".

traits.locale_text: "These things need to be filled with high psi-sensitivity Tech-priests? Okay, but why use our servants? Look on the remote stations and outposts for those who were banished into the wilderness as unfit, and you shall find three times as many more suitable candidates than in the manufactoriums of our planet. The psi-receptivity rarely goes hand in hand with high rationality, and such tech-priests often end their careers in the wilderness."

The psi-receptivity rarely goes hand in hand with high rationality, and such tech-priests often end their careers in the wilderness."

languages.text: “你是说，这玩意还需要配备拥有灵能感应能力的技术神甫吗？可以，但干嘛要用我们自己的仆人？去偏远的星站和前哨站，寻找那些无法融入社会的人们。那里的合适人选，比制造工厂的人选要多上两三倍。拥有灵能感应能力的人，很少能拥有出色的理性。像这种擅长感应灵能的技术神甫，往往会在某个鸟不生蛋的地方结束他们的职业生涯。”
languages.original_text: "You say these cells need to be filled with high psy-sensitivity Tech-Priests? Sure, but why use our own servants? Just check out a few remote stations and outposts, look for cogs who were banished as unfit — and you will find three times as many more suitable candidates than in the manufactorums. Psy-receptivity rarely goes hand in hand with high rationality, and such Tech-Priests often end their careers in some backwater."

traits.locale_text: “你是说，这玩意还需要配备拥有灵能感应能力的技术神甫吗？可以，但干嘛要用我们自己的仆人？去偏远的星站和前哨站，寻找那些无法融入社会的人们。那里的合适人选，比制造工厂的人选要多上两三倍。拥有灵能感应能力的人，很少能拥有出色的理性。像这种擅长感应灵能的技术神甫，往往会在某个鸟不生蛋的地方结束他们的职业生涯。”
“这玩意还需要配备拥有灵能感应能力的技术神甫？好吧，但为什么要用我们自己的仆人呢？去在偏远的星站和前哨站，寻找那些无法融入社会的人们吧。那里的合适人选，比制造工厂的人选要多上两三倍。拥有灵能感应能力的人，很少能拥有出色的理性。像这种擅长感应灵能的技术神甫，往往会在荒原中结束他们的职业生涯。”

languages.text: «¿Que hay que meter a tecnosacerdotes con alta sensibilidad psíquica en estas celdas? Pues eso haremos, pero ¿por qué utilizar a nuestros sirvientes? Busque en estaciones y puestos avanzados remotos a engranajes desterrados por su incompetencia; encontrará el triple de candidatos que en los manufactorums. La receptividad psíquica no suele compaginarse con el raciocinio más elevado, por lo que esos tecnosacerdotes suelen acabar en lugares apartados».
languages.original_text: "You say these cells need to be filled with high psy-sensitivity Tech-Priests? Sure, but why use our own servants? Just check out a few remote stations and outposts, look for cogs who were banished as unfit — and you will find three times as many more suitable candidates than in the manufactorums. Psy-receptivity rarely goes hand in hand with high rationality, and such Tech-Priests often end their careers in some backwater."

traits.locale_text: «¿Que hay que meter a tecnosacerdotes con alta sensibilidad psíquica en estas celdas? Pues eso haremos, pero ¿por qué utilizar a nuestros sirvientes? Busque en estaciones y puestos avanzados remotos a engranajes desterrados por su incompetencia; encontrará el triple de candidatos que en los manufactorums. La receptividad psíquica no suele compaginarse con el raciocinio más elevado, por lo que esos tecnosacerdotes suelen acabar en lugares apartados».

languages.text: 「これらのセールの事に超能力感度の高い技術司祭を使用する必要があるでしょうか？いいでしょう、ではなぜ我が従者を使うのですか？遠隔地にある基地や前哨基地で不適格者として荒野に追放された者を探せば、聖工場より3倍も多くの適した候補者が見つかると思いますよ。超能力受容性と高い合理性とは密接に関わっていることなどほとんどなく、そのような技術司祭は荒野で自らのキャリアを終えることが多いようです」
languages.original_text: "You say these cells need to be filled with high psy-sensitivity Tech-Priests? Sure, but why use our own servants? Just check out a few remote stations and outposts, look for cogs who were banished as unfit — and you will find three times as many more suitable candidates than in the manufactorums. Psy-receptivity rarely goes hand in hand with high rationality, and such Tech-Priests often end their careers in some backwater."

traits.locale_text: 「これらの事に超能力感度の高い技術司祭を使用する必要があるでしょうか？いいでしょう、ではなぜ我が従者を使うのですか？遠隔地にある基地や前哨基地で不適格者として荒野に追放された者を探せば、聖工場より3倍も多くの適した候補者が見つかると思いますよ。超能力受容性と高い合理性とは密接に関わっていることなどほとんどなく、そのような技術司祭は荒野で自らのキャリアを終えることが多いようです」
「これらの事に超能力感度の高い技術司祭を使用する必要があるでしょうか？いいでしょう、ではなぜ我が従者を使うのですか？遠隔地にある基地や前哨基地で不適格者として荒野に追放された者を探せば、聖工場より3倍も多くの適した候補者が見つかると思いますよ。超能力受容性と高い合理性とは密接に関わっていることなどほとんどなく、そのような技術司祭は荒野で自らのキャリアを終えることが多いようです」

languages.text: « Vous dites que ces cellules doivent être remplies de technoprêtres hautement sensibles aux énergies psychiques ? Admettons, mais pourquoi faire appel à nos propres serviteurs ? Allez plutôt chercher du côté des stations isolées et des avant-postes perdus, cherchez des rouages bannis pour leur incompétence ; vous y trouverez trois fois plus de candidats adéquats que dans les manufactorums. La psyréceptivité va rarement de pair avec une capacité de raisonnement rationnelle, et les technoprêtres de ce genre finissent souvent leur carrière dans l'exil. »
languages.original_text: "You say these cells need to be filled with high psy-sensitivity Tech-Priests? Sure, but why use our own servants? Just check out a few remote stations and outposts, look for cogs who were banished as unfit — and you will find three times as many more suitable candidates than in the manufactorums. Psy-receptivity rarely goes hand in hand with high rationality, and such Tech-Priests often end their careers in some backwater."

traits.locale_text: « Vous dites que ces cellules doivent être remplies de technoprêtres hautement sensibles aux énergies psychiques ? Admettons, mais pourquoi faire appel à nos propres serviteurs ? Allez plutôt chercher du côté des stations isolées et des avant-postes perdus, cherchez des rouages bannis pour leur incompétence ; vous y trouverez trois fois plus de candidats adéquats que dans les manufactorums. La psyréceptivité va rarement de pair avec une capacité de raisonnement rationnelle, et les technoprêtres de ce genre finissent souvent leur carrière dans l'exil. »

languages.text: "Ihr sagt, diese Zellen müssen mit Techpriester mit hoher psionischer Sensibilität besetzt werden? Sicher, aber warum sollten wir unsere eigenen Diener verwenden? Seht Euch auf einigen abgelegenen Stationen und Außenposten nach Cogs um, die als ungeeignet verbannt wurden. Dort werdet Ihr dreimal so viele geeignete Kandidaten wie in den Manufactorien finden. Psionische Rezeptivität geht selten Hand in Hand mit hoher Rationalität, und solche Techpriester beenden ihre Karrieren oft an entlegenen Orten."
languages.original_text: "You say these cells need to be filled with high psy-sensitivity Tech-Priests? Sure, but why use our own servants? Just check out a few remote stations and outposts, look for cogs who were banished as unfit — and you will find three times as many more suitable candidates than in the manufactorums. Psy-receptivity rarely goes hand in hand with high rationality, and such Tech-Priests often end their careers in some backwater."

traits.locale_text: "Ihr sagt, diese Zellen müssen mit Techpriester mit hoher psionischer Sensibilität besetzt werden? Sicher, aber warum sollten wir unsere eigenen Diener verwenden? Seht Euch auf einigen abgelegenen Stationen und Außenposten nach Cogs um, die als ungeeignet verbannt wurden. Dort werdet Ihr dreimal so viele geeignete Kandidaten wie in den Manufactorien finden. Psionische Rezeptivität geht selten Hand in Hand mit hoher Rationalität, und solche Techpriester beenden ihre Karrieren oft an entlegenen Orten."

"Diese Dinger müssen mit Techpriester mit hoher Psi-Sensibilität gefüllt werden? Okay, aber warum sollten wir unsere Diener verwenden? Sucht auf abgelegenen Stationen und Außenposten nach Techpriestern, die wegen Unfähigkeit in die Wildnis verbannt wurden. Dort findet Ihr dreimal so viele geeignete Kandidaten wie in den Manufactorien. Psi-Rezeptivität geht selten Hand in Hand mit hoher Rationalität, und solche Techpriester beenden ihre Karrieren oft in der Wildnis."

languages.text: "Bu hücreleri ruhsezi idraki yüksek Tekno Rahiplerle mi doldurmak gerekiyormuş? Peki ama neden kendi hizmetkârlarımız kullanılıyor? Uygun görülmeyip ıssız istasyonlara ve karakollara sürgün edilenler arasında manufaktorumlarda bulunan münasip adaylara kıyasla üç misli fazla teknikçi bulabilirsiniz. Ruhsezi idraki, aklıselimlikle pek bağdaşmaz. Bu Tekno Rahipler de kendilerini sıklıkla ücrada bulur."
languages.original_text: "You say these cells need to be filled with high psy-sensitivity Tech-Priests? Sure, but why use our own servants? Just check out a few remote stations and outposts, look for cogs who were banished as unfit — and you will find three times as many more suitable candidates than in the manufactorums. Psy-receptivity rarely goes hand in hand with high rationality, and such Tech-Priests often end their careers in some backwater."
